commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
version: '3'

services:
    app: 
        build:
            context: .
            dockerfile: Dockerfile
            args:
                # Update the VARIANT arg to pick a Java version: 11, 17
                VARIANT: "17"
                # Options
                INSTALL_MAVEN: "false"
                INSTALL_GRADLE: "false"
                NODE_VERSION: "lts/*"
        volumes:
            - ..:/workspaces/game_engine:cached

        command: sleep infinity
